messages.title: SEND A MESSAGE
messages.content: Liberal Democrats have blocked Conservative plans to allow companies to take over schools and run them for profit.

messages.title: NOT FOR SALE
messages.content: Sign the petition today and send a message that our schools aren't for sale. LibDems.org.uk/Not_For_Sale

keyPolicies.policyDescription: The Liberal Democrats will protect spending on education from nursery to college level over the course of the next Parliament, as part of their manifesto commitment.
The Liberal Democrats aim to balance the budget by 2018, matching the Conservative commitment to eliminate the deficit.

issues.economy: The Lib Dems have matched the Conservative commitment to eliminate the deficit by 2018.

endorsements.endorsement: The Lib Dems have matched the Conservative commitment to eliminate the deficit by 2018.
The Lib Dem policy to protect spending from nursery to college level over the course of the next Parliament features on the front page of the Lib Dem manifesto.
Conservatives to cut school funding by 10% if they win general election.

quotes.text: The Lib Dems have matched the Conservative commitment to eliminate the deficit by 2018.
The Lib Dem policy to protect spending from nursery to college level over the course of the next Parliament features on the front page of the Lib Dem manifesto.
Conservatives to cut school funding by 10% if they win general election.

images.caption: Liberal Democrats are fighting for a fairer society...
While Conservative cuts will hurt our schools...
Only the Liberal Democrats will balance the budget AND protect our schools from cuts
